comment: Absolutely terrible teacher. Never replies to emails . She sends plenty though. NEED a doctors note to miss regardless of situation. No time to complete work whatsoever, every day she assigned something new. Focuses to much on studies and not enough on design. She was always late to class. Would not recommend. Took her for studio 4.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Good Professor but inconsistent. Often arrives late to class from campus meetings. She's too focused on activities outside of class to care about what's happening inside of class.

sometimes she speaks really fast, other times it takes her forever to finish one topic. pace her & tell her if you don't follow.  lots of reading and essays that you'll have to write but it helps with her test.  her study guides don't help much because her test are 15-25 questions long but she gives you 50 things to study.  know everything

attendance isn't mandatory but going to class helps because if you don't get input from her, it's hard to know what she'll like or not in your project.  she's great for 1st semester 2nd yr because you will learn everything you need for 2nd yr. she's not afraid to tell you to start over right before final review. she has favorites and grades harshly

For both cultures and Studio, Prof. Bedette exemplifies the idea of "Education" in the modern era. She is not only very well versed in architectural history and present design ideologies, she also displays a level of commitment and care to her students which is hard to come by. This mixture of both passion and compassion are ideal in academia.
One of my best studio professors ever. Took some time to get used to how she would explain things, but the experience from her teaching was amazing.

I've had very positive experiences at SPSU and others not so. It's random based on the professor's interest and commitment. This is the experience I've had in this studio, the professor invests time in those she feels worthy & neglect others. You'll have a great semester if you fall on the interest side, if your not getting it, this prof won't help

Her tests are pretty hard...if you dont study. Know more about why rather than the architect and the building. Good luck figuring out how she grades the making an argument assignments. It's a mystery. But I think she's a great teacher

A very theoretical teacher, can get off subject easily. Spends a lot of time saying "what if" even though she has an idea in mind for an example. It depends on what kind of learner you are as to how much you learn in her class, better if you do it on your own sometimes. If you are nice to her she will like you- but that doesn't mean you get an A.
gREAT PROFESSOR HELPED ME WIN SECOND PLACE IN COMPETITON FOR FIRST YEAR ARCHITECTURE. REALLY LIKED THIS TEACHER. I ENDED UP WITH AN A IN HER CLASS.
Very hard to understand what she wants, it was never clear what she was expecting from us. She is very knowledgeable in the topic
I learned so much with her! She'll ask you for detailed steps along the process... You'll thank her for the results! All the work I did in her class is good portafolio material!

She's very difficult to understand as far as what she wants. But she'll eventually persuade you to just do what she had in mind in the first place without letting you think on your own. BUT if you flirt with her, she's nice.

Unprofessional, She is not a knowledgeable person. She forces her personal approach and wants it to be done her way, she doesn't care about your thoughts, she just wants the assignments done.Not helpful at all. Her thoughts are confuses. She has her favorites. very unprofessional.don't take her, unless you are a submissive person.
Great professor; though she doesn't say too much unless you ask for it.
Very bad. I feel sad for her future (and current) students. She lacks the experience needed to effectively run a studio.
great teacher
Bedette has some issues with staying on topic, but if you can get her to focus then she is pretty nice. Its also funny to watch her flirt with Ziada.
Not good, just not good at all, stay away if you can, just stay away!
She leaves class early, so you ask her any question.

Kathryn is GREAT!!! She is a very quirky teacher, but is awesome at helping students.  She takes the time to help students and go through ideas with them.  She is understanding, and helps students to gain experience and learn about the design process.  She is a great teacher, and highly recommended.  One of the nicest studio teachers at SParch!
No Comments

She is very helpful and nice. Unlike other teachers, she will actually sit with you for a long time and try to give you ideas and help you. Sometimes she is not very clear with her questions and comments, but she has a helpful disposition. great attitude towards inexperienced students.
